about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the harsh realities of the wilderness with TRAPPER, a 2D pixel art adventure / strategy game that challenges your survival instincts.

As a lone survivor, you must navigate through a world where every decision counts. Master the essential skills of scavenging, crafting, fishing, hunting, and cooking in order to stay alive.


Explore a variety of environments to find crucial resources. From abandoned ruins to dense forests, every location offers unique items that can aid your survival.


Use the materials you gather to create tools, weapons, and shelters. Crafting is essential for protection and survival in the wild.


Enjoy the tranquility of fishing in lakes and rivers. Fishing provides a reliable food source and a moment of peace in a dangerous world.


Track and hunt wildlife to secure food and materials. Use your crafted weapons and traps to ensure a successful hunt.


Combine your gathered ingredients to cook meals that restore health and energy. Cooking is vital for maintaining your strength and well-being.


Engage in strategic turn-based battles with wild animals and other threats. Plan your moves carefully to survive each encounter.


Manage your supplies and stats wisely. Always be prepared for unexpected challenges. Running out of resources can lead to dire consequences.

In TRAPPER, the wilderness is unforgiving, and being unprepared can have dramatic consequences. Are you ready to test your survival skills and face the challenges of the wild? Embark on this thrilling adventure and prove your mettle!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
